name: Jorin
appearance: Sharp cheekbones, saffron-trim tabard over soft boots; jasmine oil and chain-grease cling to him.
character: Urbane and calculating with a calm, cold center; abhors chaos that doesn’t pay.
dreams: Monopolize airflow influence in the Wind Court
Accrete favors to eclipse Matron Vessa
secrets: Sells select secrets to both Aerarium and Unmoored cells
Owns an unlicensed Shattersea shard that shows buyers’ fears
Smuggled tuned chimes to ground insurgents, then burned the trail
